resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run test 1047 from http://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/tp/UI+Composite+Layout+Behavior+Test+Case

Actual Result:
Height value is incorrect

Expected Result:
Height value should be 40
fields.summary: Android: Top precedence is not calculating the correct height value when bottom contradicts center value

comments.body:
Actual Result:

View have center.y as 30 and view.size.height is 40 and shifted 10 units down

Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.0.v20120602010244
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.0.201206010843
Emulator: Android 2.2
Abdroid Runtime: v8
